Posts.Content: Anytime there is a suspicious lesion in your breast, you should see a surgeon, I saw one that specializes in the Breast. They can have it biopsied. How was the mass found? Please do not put this off, it can make all the difference in the world for treatment. The earlier it is caught the better the outcome. I wish you the best DC2008:angel:
Posts.Title: is a breast cyst that is 4cm long and half as narrow suspicious?
